content: **knitted stole/scarf with lace pattern in drops brushed alpaca silk ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern as-162 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = 46 cm length = 180 cm **materials** drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 17 light lavender needles drops single pointed needles size 5 5 mm **knitting gauge ** 16 stitches in width and 20 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 14 stitches with lace pattern a 1 = 10 cm in width note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
